## Welcome

Welcome to my personal blog. Here, you can find posts related to R, Statistics & Economics. My posts are also published on the official blog of [Rsquared Academy](http://www.rsquaredacademy.com/blog/) and you can find posts on a variety of topics related to R there as well.

This blog is built using [blogdown](https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown) and published on [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/)
